attributes.action: Include all signitures from similar petitions to make one big petition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I've noticed alot of petitions that have the same idea but that are worded differently. The government need to combine these seperate petitions so as to relise the true number of citizens that feel strongly about the situation.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
